title: Lemon drizzle cake
description: This lemon drizzle loaf cake is a French teatime favourite that Raymond Blanc has served at his restaurant for the past 25 years. Equipment and preparation: You will need a 26cm x 9cm x 8cm/10in x 3½in x 3in loaf tin.
ingredients: 3 tbsp apricot jam, warmed in a small saucepan
